name: Old Samurai
description:
The story of an acient samurai.

Guide :

In the first task, you need to get your belongings from the locker downstairs. Then you have to collect the glasses on the table in the garden and leave those glasses next to the barrels at the back of the house.

After doing this, you have to go and throw the wood standing in front of the door into the fireplace. Then you have to read the note in the book on the top floor and go to sleep. The guest you are looking for is waiting for you in front of your door. After talking to him, you need to take your sword from the upper floor and defeat everyone.

Made For Global Game Jam

Made By :
Buçar Enes Sarısaç
